content.rendered:
What is Bread (BRD)

Bread is a system of wallets for cryptocurrencies. Payments for services within it are made by its own digital currency of the same name, which was designated BRD. Bread is a relatively young cryptocurrency, which appeared only in 2017. Due to the high popularity of the system, many experts predict the BRD crypto’s great future. You can pay for wallet services in BRD, open deposits, get credit services, etc.

Bread Wallet

Manage your crypto wisely! Learn how to setup Atomic Wallet to send, receive, exchange and buy cryptocurrency.
